title: Strengthening Web Development Practical Competencies: Mobile Microlearning Design for Virtual Education Quality Assurance

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze quality indicators of virtual education programs.
Learners apply design principles for mathematics educational content optimized for mobile environments.

Learners can propose three or more technical solutions (e.g., screen magnification, audio guidance, keyboard navigation) to enhance accessibility for learners aged 40 and above in digital learning environments, and provide evidence-based explanations of over 200 characters for each solution.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
